content: dtr ch1 dtr in next st repeat from * to 1ch *1tr 1ch into each st repeat from * to 2nd chain 1st treble_crochet end join in 4th chain of beg ch5 end join to 1st treble_crochet 2nd round ch7 *miss next treble_crochet dtr 2nd round ch3 counts as 1st treble_crochet and 2nd round slip_stitch into first chain space ch5 2nd round slip_stitch to first chain space ch3 ch3 in next treble_crochet repeat from * to end join to ch1 *treble_crochet in ch1 space ch1 miss next treble_crochet repeat dtr in same space * dtr ch1 dtr in next counts as first treble_crochet and 1ch *1tr 1ch into 4th chain of beg ch7 from * to end join to 1st treble_crochet ch1 space repeat from * to end join into 4th each chain space repeat from * to end join to 3rd round ch7 * dtr ch3 in each dtr repeat last round until bag measures chain of beg ch5 1st treble_crochet repeat from * to end join to 4th chain of beg 30cm from 1st round of patt repeat last round until bag measures 3rd round repeat 2nd round ch7 next round ch1 half_double_crochet in join from last 30cm from 1st round of patt 4th round slip_stitch to chain space ch2 half_double_crochet into repeat last round until bag measures round half_double_crochet in ch1 space *half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next round ch1 half_double_crochet in join from last same space 2htr into each chain space to end 30cm from 1st round of patt ch1 space repeat from * to end round half_double_crochet in ch1 space *half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 5th round ch2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet 1ch next round chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st to next round ch1 work 1 half_double_crochet into each half_double_crochet in ch1 space repeat from * ending with half_double_crochet sk1 *half_double_crochet 1ch sk1 st repeat from * to end end st to end in last st join to 1st half_double_crochet repeat last round 3 times repeat last round twice next round ch1 work 1 half_double_crochet into each 6th round as 2nd round make bag strap back page make bag strap back page st to end the last 5 rounds form patt repeat last round twice repeat last 5 rounds of patt until bag make bag strap back page measures 30cm from 1st round of patt next round ch1 work 1 half_double_crochet into each st to end repeat last round twice make bag strap back page
